    if ( newValue === '') {
	
        return;
    }
	if(newValue != ''|| isLoading ){
		var requestorfor= g_form.getValue('requested_for');
		
        var ga = new GlideAjax('LocationSetter');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'setLoc');
		ga.addParam('sysparm_requestorfor', requestorfor);
		
        ga.getXML(callbackfunction);

		function callbackfunction(response) {
            var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
			g_form.setValue('location', answer);
			g_form.setValue('origin', answer);
        
        }
    
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>tbhatt2</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-05 22:14:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>6312e22a2f3c6010a1cf57ab2799b61b</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>248fe99d2fa12010a1cf57ab2799b6da</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setLocation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_248fe99d2fa12010a1cf57ab2799b6da</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>tbhatt2</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-05 22:14:32</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.LocationSetter</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>LocationSetter</name><script><![CDATA[var LocationSetter = Class.create();
LocationSetter.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    setLoc: function() {

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_requestorfor'));
		gs.addInfoMessage(gr.location.country);
        return gr.location;

    },
	setDemostic: function() {

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_requestorfor'));
		var gc = new GlideRecord('cmn_location');
		
		gc.get(gr.location);
		
		
        return gc.country.sys_id;
//
    },
	





    type: 'LocationSetter'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>tbhatt2</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-30 16:06:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>caabd1572f196410a1cf57ab2799b622</sys_id><sys_mod_count>79</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LocationSetter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_caabd1572f196410a1cf57ab2799b622</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>tbhatt2</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-05 22:21:04</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.contryChangeOnCity1</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>contryChangeOnCity1</name><script><![CDATA[var contryChangeOnCity1 = Class.create();
contryChangeOnCity1.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
getCountryBySelectCity: function() {
     
        var ct = new GlideRecord('cmn_location');
        ct.addQuery('city', this.getParameter('sysparm_cityName'));
        ct.query();
		while(ct.next()){
			//gs.addInfoMessage(ct.country);
		}
			
        var gl = new GlideRecord('cmn_location');
        gl.addQuery('4767b92070002010d152c959a69db59b' , ct.country);
        gl.query();

       while (gl.next()){
			if(ct.country==gl.name){
				
			
				return gl.sys_id;
			}
			
		}

	



},
	getCountryBySelectDomain: function() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_requestorfor'));
		//gs.addInfoMessage("this is domain " + gr.location.country);
		
        var gl = new GlideRecord('cmn_location');
        gl.addQuery('4767b92070002010d152c959a69db59b' , gr.location.country);
        gl.query();

       while (gl.next()){
			if(gr.location.country==gl.name){
				
			
				return gl.sys_id;
			}
			
		}
			
	},

    type: 'contryChangeOnCity1'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>tbhatt2</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-05 01:16:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>a88f05012f616010a1cf57ab2799b6c1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>50</sys_mod_count><sys_name>contryChangeOnCity1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a88f05012f616010a1cf57ab2799b6c1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>tbhatt2</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-05 22:21:46</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="6312e22a2f3c6010a1cf57ab2799b61b" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Shipping Request">fb7f619d2fa12010a1cf57ab2799b67d</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0c8fe99d2fa12010a1cf57ab2799b66b</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>setCountryOnDemostic</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
    if ( newValue === '') {
	
        return;
    }
	if(newValue == 'domestic' ){
		var requestorfor= g_form.getValue('requested_for');
	
        var ga = new GlideAjax('contryChangeOnCity1');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCountryBySelectDomain');
		ga.addParam('sysparm_requestorfor', requestorfor);
		
        ga.getXML(callbackfunction);

		function callbackfunction(response) {
            var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
			g_form.setValue('country', answer);
			
	
        
        }
    
	}else{
		g_form.setValue('country', '');
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>tbhatt2</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-05 22:14:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>6312e22a2f3c6010a1cf57ab2799b61b</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>208fe99d2fa12010a1cf57ab2799b6d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setCountryOnDemostic</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_208fe99d2fa12010a1cf57ab2799b6d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>tbhatt2</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-05 22:14:32</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="6312e22a2f3c6010a1cf57ab2799b61b" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Shipping Request">fb7f619d2fa12010a1cf57ab2799b67d</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:8c8fe99d2fa12010a1cf57ab2799b672</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>changeCountryOnCity</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
    if ( newValue === '') {
	
        return;
    }
	if(newValue != '' ){
		var cityName= g_form.getValue('city');
		alert('test');
        var ga = new GlideAjax('contryChangeOnCity');
        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCountryBySelectCity');
		ga.addParam('sysparm_cityName', cityName);
		
        ga.getXML(callbackfunction);

		function callbackfunction(response) {
            var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
			g_form.setValue('country', answer);
			
	
        
        }
    
	}else{
		g_form.setValue('country', '');
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>tbhatt2</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-05 22:14:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>6312e22a2f3c6010a1cf57ab2799b61b</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>!!!/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a08fe99d2fa12010a1cf57ab2799b6d7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>changeCountryOnCity</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_a08fe99d2fa12010a1cf57ab2799b6d7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>tbhatt2</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-05 22:14:32</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
